reviews.review: 狠狠背刺喵
我是傻逼，被e宝背刺

虽然惨遭epic背刺，但是我还是不后悔购买bioshock这一电子游戏史上的一大奇迹。我真的不觉得自己的钱打水漂了。

当时一代玩的盗版，只觉得设计手感僵硬（还有电脑过于卡顿的缘故，我当年小小的thinkpad承受了太多不该承受的东西），关卡设计阴森，我一度怀疑是不是下错了，下成生化危机了。咬牙玩完了一代，感觉剧情像走马灯一样恍惚，随后便将其自然忘却了。

去年冬天我为了买ttf2充了30多块钱，结果买完了还剩下很多钱（A区价格太便宜），于是便随手买了个bioshock合集和v社合集（差不多每个都是十块左右），想着电脑也更新了，总归能流畅游玩不卡顿了。说真的这三十多块是我在steam上花过最值的一笔。

买了后的一个空闲周末一鼓作气玩完了ttf2，不过生化奇兵无限我一直留到了寒假，留了三天中午不间断地一次性打完，感觉和第一次游玩一样恍惚，不过这次真的是沉浸在剧情中了。又到豆瓣上看了一些解析，更加佩服ken levine了。

剧情我就不说了，说了会影响体验。epic来的新人建议先从无限入手，如果能忍受大便一般的设计手感的话可以再玩一代和二代，最后再玩三代的dlc海葬两部曲。

另外，玩之前最好一点剧透都不要看，但玩完了请务必要看解析，生化奇兵值得你一帧一帧地

汉化补丁我放在这了，不晓得epic版本能不能用：https://m.3dmgame.com/dl/patch/30362.html

最后，真心祝愿你们也能遇上属于自己的伊丽莎白。
Liebe
7小时快速过剧情，游玩过程错过无数细节，甚至在结局之前有点受够了传统RPG的玩法，但是结局真的让人眼前一亮，二刷补一补细节但是有生之年应该不会二刷了。没有人能拒绝一个随时能补充状态的伊丽莎白！伊丽莎白永远的白月光！
10分神作

Masterpiece, Now i get it how this game is Infinite not 3. It's not what player expect from previous installment, You don't get the horror but thriller still gives player chills. Major different theme but gives you amazing experience that you didn't get in previous. The Plot & Gameplay 9.6/10

Me encanta bioshock, la verdad me entretuvo mucho mas que los 2 primeros ya que aqui se perfecciona mas la jugabilidad a un estilo mas arcaico y simple. 

Me encantan los vigorizadores, sobre todo el diseño y animacion de las botellas cuando te las tomas. 
Tambien cuando las utilizas contra enemigos hay algunas que son entretenidas de usar sobre todo la de los cuervos. 

A nivel narrativo tambien me gusta y me atrapo tanto la primera vez que lo jugue que me baje los DLC para terminar la historia.

Es un juego que me saco varias horas y es muy entretenido de jugar aunque la rejugabilidad es tosca ya que el juego te obliga a seguir la misma narrativa una y otra vez ininterrumpidamente y eso le quita un poco lo frenetico. Pero sin dudas lo disfruto bastante
not quite infinte

el mejor puto juego que probe en mi vida

Great game. Gave the Bioshock series updated mechanics, a new setting, and a new philosophical critique without losing itself. Instead of a thought experiment critiquing the philosophies of Ayn Rand, this is a serious look at one logical extreme of American civic religion, while also incorporating and highlights a historical racial tensions (e.g. the Irish) that are unknown or forgotten by many Americans. Honestly the story has so many levels I can't cover them all in a review. This game has a very thought provoking story, I would say particularly so for an American audience, since the culture highlighted is so American, but also clearly morally problematic. Even if you're not particularly a fan of first-person shooters, the story line alone is worth it!
Mindblowingly good story and gameplay

"The central focus of BioShock is the Cycle of Oppression. Ken Levine, the games’ director, takes the player on a journey across time and space, and concludes that historically there are “constants and variables.” White people along with their sense of nationalism and religion are always the prime movers of the Cycle of Oppression, while Jews and people of color are their victims. The latter may periodically engage in immoral behavior, but it is always in response to past oppression inflicted on them. BioShock Infinite uses a meta-design to attack the player both directly and indirectly, stating essentially that even if the player believes himself to be a good person who consciously adheres to the tenets of the new-age religion of egalitarianism, evil still resides within him waiting to be unleashed. He is in fact the very thing, he believes to be fighting against. In brief, BioShock Infinite conveys the message that the White male gamer’s only path to redemption is death."         
-AmericanKrogan

Solo tengo una palabra, INCREIBLE, hace ya años que jugue el primer bioshock en mi PS3 y a pesar de todo aun tengo muchos recuerdos de los lugares y personajes que aparecen ahi, pense que este bioshock iba a ser parecido al primero pero no es igual, lo cual no es malo, de hecho me gusto que sea algo distinto al primero, pero en fin, la historia me volo la cabeza y pense que no tenia nada que ver rapture con esta nueva ciudad llamada columbia, pero NOP estan relacionadas jajajaj y los DLC no se quedan atras, son todo un viaje de nostalgia que a cualquier fan de bioshock le encantara ver, compra asegurada capo.

I don't understand why everyone loves this game so much, I enjoyed the first two games, bioshock 2 was my absolute favorite.  The combat was fun and enjoyable at first, but everything about the games turns into a giant slog-fest that just becomes worse and worse the more i play it.  I am 10 hours in and i feel it could have ended, I just want it to end at this point.  The story at first was enjoyable, but now its just confusing and stupid with crisscrossed timey wimey bullshit.  I've had to quit multiple times because I just got TIRED and SICK of playing, and sigh every time I need to come back to finish the game.  The game isn't even difficult enough to call it a challenge.

Great game and series. Haven't never fully finished this game on 360 and decided to play through the series after a sale. After finishing all 3 I see why this series is so critically acclaimed.
